import React from 'react' import EventService from '../../service/Events.service' import { Container, Row, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import EventCard from './Events-card' import EventForm from './Events-form' class EventList extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this._EventService = new EventService() this.state = { events: [], showModalWindow: false } } componentDidMount = () => this.updateEventsList() updateEventsList = () => { this._service.getAllEvents() .then(allEventsFromDB => this.setState({ events: allEventsFromDB.data })) .catch(err => console.log("Error", err)) } handleShow = () => this.setState({ showModalWindow: true }) handleClose = () => this.setState({ showModalWindow: false }) render() { return (
